channel.title: Geneva Global Governance Observatory
channel.description: Recent content on Geneva Global Governance Observatory

item.title: An overview of the GGO data
item.description: We have collected lots of data on about Global Governance from multiple sources! All of the data is publicly available in the form of R packages for various issue-domains of global Governance.

item.title: How Do Environmental Treaties Connect?
item.description: There are many different ways in which environmental treaties can be linked. Here we propose a few ways in which data in manyenviron can help tell stories about the environment.

item.title: Working with manystates data
item.description: Have democracies become more free and accountable since the 1990s? We use manystates data on states in the international system across time to investigate this question.
